name: Click on words simulator
description:
this is a very simple html game in which you click underlined words to unveil the story. It's not a mechanically rich game, but the short narrative hopefully drives the gameplay or vice versa.

There's something about working with plain text that makes me feel happy.

This is a slightly tough puzzler, with its focus being story, but I don't know. 

Thanks for playing and thanks to my creator for helping me through.
